subject: Re: Naming Test classes, was:Re: [junit] Test Variants
msgSnippet: ... Would your suggestion for the test class which has two accounts in its fixture then be AccountTestWithTwoAccounts rather than AccountTranferTest ? What
messageBody:
> Simply choose descriptive names. Why wouldn't that be enough to find
> the tests? If you had to name the test RIGHT NOW, what would you name
> it? Perhaps that name is good enough.

Would your suggestion for the test class which has two accounts in its
fixture then be "AccountTestWithTwoAccounts" rather than "AccountTranferTest"?
What about the one transfer test which needs only one account? Where does it go?

Johannes
